data.name: Project Squimfinite
data.detailed_description:
What is "Project Squimfinite"?
"Project Squimfinite" is the DLC that has it all!
By purchasing this DLC, you will have access to ALL the future content added into the game.

How Will This Work?
On the main menu, a new button will appear!
Pushing this button will bring you to a list of level packs to play that are completely separate from the main game!
Each level pack contains 10 brand new levels, never before seen!
Oh ya, new bosses are included too.
With 3 level packs and a new boss to start off at launch, new level packs may be added anytime in the future.

Features
  • More levels!
  • More level themes!
  • More bosses!
  • More Achievements!
  • More Squirm!
  • MORE!

ENJOY. SQUIRM. FOREVER.

Please be aware, that once the amount of levels in this DLC is greater than the amount of levels in the main game (120), the price will be increased to $1.99.
It WILL NOT go any higher!

data.short_description: Need more Squirm? Look no further! With this DLC, you will have access to all sorts of new level packs!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP
  • Processor: Intel Dual Core or Equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible video card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Sound Card: On-board sound
  • Additional Notes: As long as your computer isn't a potato you should be able to run this.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Dual Core or Equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible video card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Sound Card: On-board sound
  • Additional Notes: As long as your computer isn't a potato you should be able to run this.
